title: Odyssey Short story - The Lure
body: Once again a lovely new story {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

replies.body: This was a wild ride that made Kayn into a very sympathetic character even if he is ruthless in the execution of his authority. I can't really discuss it without giving away to may spoilers, but I can say it was very well written. Thank you, Dan, for writing it.

If anyone isn't familiar with Dan Abnett, please do Google him - he wrote Guardians of the Galaxy for Marvel...

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
now trying to imagine League of legends story written by different famous movie writers and directors...!
I can't wait for the Nolan Brothers to write a Zilean story or for Tarantino to write a Jinx story

I personally love this New Kayn. Baseline Kayn is pretencious and annoying. This Kayn has humility to him, he knows the soldiers and has many friends. Its almost tragic what Rhaast is doing to him to the point i actually for once want him to beat Rhaast. Something i wholeheartly DONT wish with Baseline Kayn since i hate his guts. 

Also, this short story was missing one thing: A sequel, full of Back and forth jokes, roasting and banter between him and Rhaast. I swear that is the flagship of this champion concept is the hilariousness of their relationship

I am loving this version of Rhaast. Baseline Rhaast is great and all, but he's got a sympathy angle that detracts from his horror as a villain. We know that at baseline Rhaast must have been at least sort of a decent person pre-Void or he wouldn't have been able to Ascend.

Meanwhile Odyssey Rhaast was straight up created by the Dark Star to corrupt people and destroy the universe and he's loving every minute of it.

Looks like kayn's original story on steroids. I like the comedy and badass brutality the story had to offer.
Now we need to see how Kayn's and Rhaast's karaoke night looks like. :V
Sona has more skin lore than actual lore. LoL XD
